reconfigure.description: Change the network interface for ECHONET Lite communication.
reconfigure.title: Reconfigure ECHONET Lite

data_description.interface: Select the network interface to use for ECHONET Lite communication. Select Auto to let Home Assistant automatically detect the appropriate interface.

user.description: Home Assistant automatically binds to the ECHONET Lite multicast channel (224.0.23.0:3610) and begins listening for devices.
user.title: Set up ECHONET Lite

confirm.description:
The ECHONET Lite integration encountered an error: {error}. This may be caused by network issues or device disconnection.

Press Submit to restart the ECHONET Lite integration and attempt recovery. If the problem persists, check your network configuration.
confirm.title: Restart ECHONET Lite integration

confirm.description:
No frames have been received from ECHONET Lite devices for more than {minutes} minutes. This may indicate that devices are offline or there is a network issue.

Press Submit to restart the ECHONET Lite integration. Check that your ECHONET Lite devices are powered on and connected to the network.
confirm.title: Restart ECHONET Lite integration

data_description.enable_experimental: When enabled, device classes that have not been verified with real hardware will also be registered. These may not work correctly.
data_description.poll_interval: How often to poll device properties (in seconds). Lower values provide faster updates but increase network traffic.
